item.title: Creating a Game Engine

item.title: Android Development with ChatGPT
item.description: Reliability was an issue but it was refreshing to get responses based on conceptual questions. A refreshing alternative to using a traditional search engine.

item.title: my first blog
item.description: the languages i know off the top of my head #include<iostream> int main(){ std::cout << "hello person!" << std::endl; return 0; } printf("hello again!") public static void main(String[]args){ System.out.println("Hello once more!\n"); }
